replies.body:
Heres the pack I use. Based on the faithful textures with a few other packs. All weapons and tools are 512x512, some blocks are also 512x. Only use this pack if you have lots of ram. 1 gig will crash minecraft.
Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jBVZBkFPCE&feature=youtu.be
Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/2pix9b2uqmmktp5/Mumbles+Faithful+Edit.zip
This is quite an old version, I'll put up a download to my latest version soon
